DOC.brief_summary: This purpose trial determine whether 12-month eHealth behavioral intervention include interactive self-monitoring feedback , tailor skill train material , telephone counseling call , primary care physician ( PCP ) counsel produce great weight change 12 month standard primary care control .
DOC.brief_title: New Media Obesity Treatment Community Health Centers
DOC.detailed_description: This patient randomize trial patient randomize one two treatment arm : 1 ) standard primary care ; 2 ) primary care plus 12-month eHealth behavioral intervention ( iOTA ) , include interactive self-monitoring feedback , tailor skill train material , 18 telephone counseling call , primary care provider counseling . The primary outcome weight change 12 month . Participants 351 adult male female patient local community health center obesity relate comorbidity .
DOC.criteria: At least 1 visit previous 12 month adult medicine , internal medicine , family practice provider participate community health center BMI 30.045.0 kg/m2 weight â‰¤ 320 pound Diagnosis hypertension diabetes Current pregnancy Pregnancy previous 12 month Heart attack/stroke previous 2 year Active cancer diagnosis Current participation another weight loss study
